summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Beacon Avenue, from Lander Street to Hanford Street; Sixteenth Avenue South and Seventeenth Avenue South, each from Boston Avenue to Hanford Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and material, with all wyes, openings, flush tanks, manholes, lampholes, catch basins and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 1389 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
